descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://www.ld-host.de/uploads/images/c60076cf8619f051f507e74f330264e0.gif[/img][/url]

Forever Free Seal In Wax
[/size]______________________________________________________________________________________________
[color=#efefef][size=3]
[b]Forever Free is a future proofing promise to the community that the particular mod
will always be free to download regardless of any future opportunity's to monetize the mod.[/b][/size][/color][color=#00ff00][size=5][/size][/color]
______________________________________________________________________________________________

This is a Version of the "Forever Free Sign" printed into fluid wax. This habbit was often done in medieval
times to conseal a very important document from being read without permission. If the seal was broken, the
owner knew, someone discovered the information, which was supposed to be hidden!

Seals also were used to just make documents a valid peace of 
paper, authorized by an important Institution or Authority. For example during war it was very important that
Messangers carried sealed messages with a specific logo on it to leaders of the army, so every member of the
army could identify the message as a valid order. I found it would look pretty cool to have a Seal of "Forever Free"
in a way that appeals very much to the medieval times and makes much sence for a sign like this.

______________________________________________________________________________________________

[size=5]I want to thank mysticentity for permission to create
a modded version of: 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?]Forever Free by [b]mysticentity and The Creation Kids

[/b][/url][/size]Follow the link above to find out about this sign and why they created it.
______________________________________________________________________________________________


If you want to use this mod in yours, you can do so by giving full credit to me, 
[color=#ff7700]mysticentity and the Creation Kids!

[/color]You just have to ask them, not me!!!

______________________________________________________________________________________________

I hope you like this version as much as i do!

Best regards!
Destero
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65157/?]

[/url][/center]
author: Destero
